headline.print_headline: ND OKs Power Line in Historic Battlefield Area
headline.main: ND OKs Power Line in Historic Battlefield Area

lead_paragraph: North Dakota regulators on Wednesday approved a permit for a proposed $375 million high-voltage power line that would run through the Killdeer Mountain Battlefield, a site in the western part of the state where a battle between U.S. Army soldiers and American Indians occurred in 1864.
